data.description:
Premium Bowling is as close to real bowling as you'll get without picking up a physical bowling ball.

Start the game and enjoy ten pin bowling right at home! Play online or pass the headset with your friends. Conquer top score lists, live tournaments and leagues to work your way to the top in player ranking.

Main Features:

- The best bowling physics simulation
- Many gorgeous bowling alleys
- Many balls and possibility to create custom balls
- Pass the headset with as many friends as you want
- Online multiplayer with no group size limitations
- Live tournaments with qualifying, step ladder and finals
- Weekly and monthly leagues
- Daily and weekly tops
- Continuous week-to-week player ranking
- Teams to play co-op
- Many oil patterns
- Oil gets carried and wears out
- Single player, pass the headset and online multiplayer support
- Voice chat
- Commentator
- Music player
- Slow motion replays
- Cross play
- Cross buy

NOTE: limited Quest 1 support after July 2024. More info at: www.premiumbowling.com/quest1

changelog.change_log:
Premium Bowling 1.27 Released!
- Celebrations for victories and achievements
- Improved menu graphics
- Added spectator mode to tournaments
- Combined tops for VR and non-VR players

1.27.1:
- Small improvements and bug fixes

Premium Bowling 1.27 Released!
- Celebrations for victories and achievements
- Improved menu graphics
- Added spectator mode to tournaments
- Combined tops for VR and non-VR players
- Bug fixes and small improvements

Live Tournaments Released!

The latest 1.26 update is here with long-waited Tournaments—immerse yourself in thrilling live competitions, fierce step ladders, and top-tier grid finals. Roll your way to victory in live tournaments and get to the top of competition ranking! Other big improvements coming with this update are improved Party Bowling alley and removal of VR aim helper to level the playing field.

Quest 3 Update Released!

We're excited to bring you Premium Bowling version 1.25, now optimized for the Meta Quest 3! This update enhances your bowling experience with improved graphics and some dynamic extras like smoke effect in the Disco Alley.

Summer Update is Here!

Version 1.24 is rolling in with improved graphics, new strike effects, whopping 14 new oil patterns and physics improvements. We've also packed in a few more goodies that are sweeter than a melted ice cream cone. So, why sweat outside when you can have a blast indoors with Premium Bowling's Summer Update? Let's keep the good times rolling!

1.24.1 - 1.24.2:
 - Bug fixes and small improvements

1.24.3:
 - Added Rematch option after completing a multiplayer competition
 - Bug fixes and small improvements
